resources.string: Cannot Open App
Licence Expiring Soon
Please use a controller to continue setting up a pass-through keyboard area.
OK

Look down at the floor and hold your hand out in front of you. Pinch and hold your thumb and index finger together to draw along the boundary of your playing area.

We recommend a playing area size of 6.5 x 6.5 feet or greater for roomscale experiences.

Look down at the floor and hold your hand out in front of you. Pinch and hold your thumb and index finger together to draw along the boundary of your playing area.

We recommend a playing area size of 2 x 2 metres or greater for roomscale experiences.

Point your controller at the floor, then press and hold the trigger to draw along the boundary of your cleared playing area.

We recommend a playing area size of 6.5 x 6.5 feet or greater for roomscale experiences.

Point your controller at the floor, then press and hold the trigger to draw along the boundary of your cleared playing area.

We recommend a playing area size of 2 x 2 metres or greater for roomscale experiences.
Define play area
Make sure that the surface lines up with your sofa seat.
Please confirm that you are entering the sofa space.
Confirm Sofa
Make sure that the surface lines up with your real desk.
Make sure that the surface lines up with your real desk.
Customise MR Surfaces
Check to make sure that the virtual whiteboard plane matches up with your real whiteboard.

1. Hold your controller against the front edge of your sofa seat, then press and hold the trigger button.

2. Draw a line from one side of the sofa to the other, then release the trigger button once you\'ve finished.

The minimum surface width is 12 inches.

Press B or Y to cancel.

1. Hold your controller against the front edge of your sofa seat, then press and hold the trigger button.

2. Draw a line from one side of the sofa to the other, then release the trigger button once you\'ve finished.

The minimum surface width is 30 cm.

Press B or Y to cancel.

1. Hold your thumb and index finger against the front edge of your sofa seat, then pinch and hold both fingers together.

2. Draw a line from one side of the sofa to the other, then release both fingers once you\'ve finished.

The minimum surface width is 12 inches.

1. Hold your thumb and index finger against the front edge of your sofa seat, then pinch and hold both fingers together.

2. Draw a line from one side of the sofa to the other, then release both fingers once you\'ve finished.

The minimum surface width is 30 cm.
Define Sofa Surface

1. Hold your controller on the front edge of your desk, then press and hold the trigger button.

2. Draw a line from one side of the desk to the other, then release the trigger button when you\'ve finished.

The minimum surface width is 20 inches.

Press B or Y to cancel.

1. Hold your controller on the front edge of your desk, then press and hold the trigger button.

2. Draw a line from one side of the desk to the other, then release the trigger button when you\'ve finished.

The minimum surface width is 50 cm.

Press B or Y to cancel.

1. Hold your thumb and index finger on the top front edge of your desk, then pinch and hold both fingers together.

2. Draw a line from one side of the desk to the other, then open both fingers when you\'ve finished.

The minimum surface width is 20 inches.

1. Hold your thumb and index finger on the top front edge of your desk, then pinch and hold both fingers together.

2. Draw a line from one side of the desk to the other, then open both fingers when you\'ve finished.

The minimum surface width is 50 cm.

To use Workrooms, you need to set up a desk.

1. Hold your controller against the front edge of your desk, then press and hold the trigger button.

2. Draw a line from one side of the desk to the other, then release the trigger button once you\'ve finished.

The minimum surface width is 20 inches.

Press B or Y to cancel.

To use Workrooms, you need to set up a desk.

1. Hold your controller against the front edge of your desk, then press and hold the trigger button.

2. Draw a line from one side of the desk to the other, then release the trigger button once you\'ve finished.

The minimum surface width is 50 cm.

Press B or Y to cancel.

To use Workrooms, you need to set up a desk.

1. Hold your thumb and index finger against the top front edge of your desk, then pinch and hold both fingers together.

2. Draw a line from one side of the desk to the other, then open both fingers once you\'ve finished.

The minimum surface width is 20 inches.

To use Workrooms, you need to set up a desk.

1. Hold your thumb and index finger against the top front edge of your desk, then pinch and hold both fingers together.

2. Draw a line from one side of the desk to the other, then open both fingers once you\'ve finished.

The minimum surface width is 50 cm.
Define Pass-through Area
Customise Sofa
Customise Desk
Customise Whiteboard
You already have a sofa in this area. How would you like to modify it?
Modify Sofa
It looks like you already have a pass-through keyboard area defined. Do you want to modify it?
Pass-through Keyboard
It looks like you already have a whiteboard in the area. Do you want to modify it?
Confirm Playing Area
Please create a new Guardian boundary for your playing area.
You\'ve left your Guardian boundary. Please remove your headset and return to your playing area, or create a new boundary.
You\'ve moved too far. Remove your headset and return to your original position, or select Continue if you are in a safe space to continue using your headset.
Your playing area meets the recommended size. You can use any roomscale, standing or seated experience in this space.

Redraw your boundary, or lift your headset and remove objects from your playing area. Some objects may not be detected.

Continuing with objects inside or near your boundary may increase your risk of injury or damage. If you get too close to the edge of your playing area, your Guardian boundary will be visible in VR to alert you.
Check for Objects in Playing Area
You\'ve spent too long outside a known play area. Please remove your headset or return to your play area.
You\'ve spent too long in Guardian setup. Please finish creating a boundary or remove your headset. Visit support.oculus.com for more information.

Look around to check that this boundary is correctly positioned and clear of any obstructions, including anything you could hit with your arms outstretched.

These can be used for all sitting or standing experiences. If you get too close to the edge of your playing area, your Guardian boundary will be visible in your VR experience to alert you.

Redraw your boundary, or lift your headset and remove objects from your playing area. Some objects may not be detected.

Continuing with objects inside or near your boundary may increase your risk of injury or damage. If you get too close to the edge of your playing area, your Guardian boundary will be visible in your VR experience to alert you.
Your play area meets the recommended size of 6.5 x 6.5 ft or greater. You can use any roomscale, standing or seated experience in this space.
Your play area meets the recommended size of 2 x 2 m or greater. You can use any roomscale, standing or seated experience in this space.

Look around to check that this boundary is correctly positioned and clear of any obstructions, including anything you could hit with your arms outstretched.

These can be used for all sitting or standing experiences. If you get too close to the edge of your playing area, your Guardian boundary will be visible in your VR experience to alert you.
Sofa

Look down at the virtual grid. If it appears to be at floor level, select Confirm.

If not, select Reset. Move the grid down by gently touching the floor with your controller before confirming.

Look down at the virtual grid. If it appears to be at floor level, select Confirm.

If not, select Reset. Move the grid down by gently touching the floor with your hand before confirming.
Your playing area is less than the minimum required size of 3 x 3 ft. You can clear more space and redraw your playing area or continue with a boundary for sitting or standing experiences only.
Your playing area is less than the minimum required size of 1 x 1 m. You can clear more space and redraw your playing area or continue with a boundary for sitting or standing experiences only.
Set Forwards Direction
Your play area is less than the recommended size of 6.5 x 6.5 ft. You can clear more space and redraw your play area or continue with what you have.
Your play area is less than the recommended size of 2 x 2 m. You can clear more space and redraw your play area or continue with what you have.

Look around to check that this boundary is clear of obstructions, including anything you could hit with your arms outstretched.

This stationary Guardian is for sitting or standing experiences only. If you get too close to the edge of your playing area, your Guardian boundary will be visible in your VR experience to alert you.

Look around to check that this boundary is clear of obstructions, including anything you could hit with your arms outstretched.

This stationary Guardian is for sitting or standing experiences only. When your headset gets close to the edge of your playing area, Pass-through will fade in and you\'ll see a real-time view of your physical environment.
Confirm sofa as your active playing area or go back to your previous playing area.
Switch to Sofa
Confirm desk as your active playing area or go back to your previous playing area.
Confirm desk as your active playing area, or go back to your previous playing area. If you switch to desk now, the app will close and you may lose any unsaved progress.
Quit and Continue
Confirm roomscale as your active playing area or go back to your previous playing area.
Confirm stationary as your active playing area or go back to your previous playing area.

Your playing area lacks the contrast, colour or pattern needed for headset tracking. Please change your playing area to restore tracking.

Guardian is disabled when tracking is off, and you won\'t be alerted to your playing area boundary. If you choose to continue without tracking, use a fixed standing or seated position to avoid injury or damage.

Your playing area lacks the contrast, colour or pattern needed for headset tracking. Please change your playing area to restore tracking, or exit this app to continue with tracking off.

Guardian is disabled when tracking is off, and you won\'t be alerted to your playing area boundary. Use a fixed standing or seated position to avoid injury or damage.

Something went wrong and your device can\'t track its movement or position in your playing area.

Guardian is disabled when tracking is off, and you won\'t be alerted to your playing area boundary. If you choose to continue without tracking, use a fixed standing or seated position to avoid injury or damage.

Something went wrong and your device can\'t track its movement or position in your playing area. Please exit this app to continue with tracking off.

Guardian is disabled when tracking is off, and you won\'t be alerted to your playing area boundary. Use a fixed standing or seated position to avoid injury or damage.

It\'s too bright in your playing area to track your headset movement. Please adjust your lighting to restore tracking.

Guardian is disabled when tracking is off, and you won\'t be alerted to your playing area boundary. If you choose to continue without tracking, use a fixed standing or seated position to avoid injury or damage.

It\'s too bright in your playing area to track your headset movement. Please adjust your lighting to restore tracking, or exit this app to continue with tracking off.

Guardian is disabled when tracking is off, and you won\'t be alerted to your playing area boundary. Use a fixed standing or seated position to avoid injury or damage.

It\'s too dark in your playing area to track your headset movement. Please adjust your lighting to restore tracking.

Guardian is disabled when tracking is off, and you won\'t be alerted to your playing area boundary. If you choose to continue without tracking, use a fixed standing or seated position to avoid injury or damage.

It\'s too dark in your playing area to track your headset movement. Please adjust your lighting to restore tracking, or quit this app to continue with tracking off.

Guardian is disabled when tracking is off, and you won\'t be alerted to your playing area boundary. Use a fixed standing or seated position to avoid injury or damage.
Guardian helps you stay within your playing area by creating a boundary around you in VR. This virtual boundary is only visible if you\'re near or touching it.
Guardian helps you stay within your playing area by creating a boundary around you in VR. This virtual boundary is only visible if you\'re near or touching it.
%1$s has available updates. Do you want to update now?
This app can\'t be used with desk. To open this app, move to a different playspace and open the app again.
This app doesn\'t comply with one or more of our policies. You can still use this app, but some functionality may be disabled until the app is in compliance. Learn More
You\'re launching an app which uses your Oculus avatar, but it looks like you haven\'t customised an avatar yet. Personalising your avatar will help people recognise you in the app.
The app you\'re trying to open needs to reserve your microphone. You\'ll remain in this party, but you won\'t be able to hear or talk to your friends until you exit this app.
The device storage is critically low. You have less than 500 MB remaining.
The device storage is getting low. You have less than 2 GB remaining.

When full Pass-through is enabled, you won\'t need to use a Guardian boundary unless you enter an immersive experience.

Use the Pass-through slider in quick settings to adjust your home environment from full VR to full Pass-through at any time.

For your safety, stay close to your original seated or standing position when Guardian is not active. Keep your playing area clear to prevent injury and follow all instructions and warnings provided on screen and with the headset.
Full Pass-through is On
Double-tap the left or right-hand side of your headset to turn on pass-through at any time. Double-tap again to exit pass-through and get back into VR.
Pass-through Shortcut
Press and hold the Oculus button, then press a trigger. Your photos will appear in your camera roll.
Double-tap the left or right side of your headset to turn off pass-through
You can change your virtual home environment and choose from a variety of options at any time in Settings.
You\'re currently using an app that requires tracking. Turning off tracking will exit this app.
Exit Open App
Guardian is disabled when tracking is off. Turn tracking on to set a Guardian boundary.

Our Platform Abuse Policy prohibits piracy, illicit modding, cheating and other unauthorised usage.

If this unofficial version of %1$s is not for development purposes, please restore the app to the Oculus Store version now.
